thread.title: SoftServe Supports Fundraising Event for Ukrainian Catholic University
thread.title_full: SoftServe Supports Fundraising Event for Ukrainian Catholic University

author: admin
title: SoftServe Supports Fundraising Event for Ukrainian Catholic University
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 7:42 AM Companies mentioned in this article: SoftServe 
AUSTIN, Texas, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SoftServe today announced its participation in a Gala Fundraising Event in support of the Ukrainian Catholic University (UCU) organized by Washington DC Friends of Ukrainian Catholic University and the Ukrainian Catholic Education Foundation . The Gala will be held on October 24, 2015, at Army Navy Country Club in Arlington, VA and will raise funds towards building a University campus and expanding educational programs across a variety of disciplines critical to Ukraine's progress, strength and stability. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140123/FL51590LOGO 
Tetyana and Taras Kytsmey (Member of the Board, SoftServe), and Meka and Wilf Voge (VP Sales and Business Development, SoftServe), will attend the Gala event where Sviatoslav Shevchuk, Patriarch of Ukrainian Greek Catholic Church, and Bishop Borys Gudziak, President of UCU, will both address the audience. 
SoftServe is a long-standing supporter of UCU having worked together in 2008 to launch the Lviv Business School , a strategic educational initiative focused on international experience and complemented with the best Ukrainian practice. Earlier this year SoftServe supported a UCU Charity Event in London , UK, which raised over Â£93,000 towards the cost of building a new campus at UCU and scholarship funds for talented low-income students. SoftServe also launched a four year Bachelor Program in Computer Science in conjunction with UCU, with all the teaching staff also working in the IT industry. 
"SoftServe is delighted to support the work of the Ukrainian Catholic University, a forward-thinking academic community, and combine our efforts for the development of educational initiatives. Our goal is to continue to support UCU's fundraising activities and to work with it to identify and develop leadership potential," said Taras Kytsmey, Member of the Board, SoftServe. 
About SoftServe 
SoftServe ( www.softserveinc.com ) is a leading technology solutions company specializing in software development and consultancy services. Since 1993 we've been partnering with organizations from start-ups to large enterprises to help them accelerate growth and innovation, transform operational efficiency, and deliver new products to market. 
Our experience stretches from Big Data/Analytics, Cloud, Security and UX Design to the Internet of Things, Digital Health and Digital Transformation, we have offices across the globe and development centers across Eastern Europe.
